definition: to tread on/to trample/to stamp/to fulfill/Taiwan pr. [dao4]

pinyin: Heng1 ding1 dun4 wu3 dao4 zheng4
Bei3 jing1 Wu3 dao3 Xue2 yuan4
Hang2 ding1 dun4 wu3 dao3 zheng4

sentences.english: The Dogon are best known for their masked dances, wooden sculptures and architecture.
sentences.chinese: 多貢是最著名的爲他們的蒙面舞蹈，木雕和建築。

sentences.english: In SCB, dancing in the new year eve celerbration also.
sentences.chinese: 深圳渣打銀行新年除夕晚會，舞蹈表演。

sentences.english: Julia is afraid she will embarrass herself and the whole team.
sentences.chinese: 茱麗雅害怕自己將舞蹈隊帶來麻煩甚至搞砸。

sentences.english: Learn about the basic steps of the Merengue in this free video dance lesson.
sentences.chinese: 有關這梅倫格學習的基本步驟在此免費視頻舞蹈課。

sentences.english: Tanghong this year over 20 years old, is a beautiful young dance teacher.
sentences.chinese: 湯鴻今年20多歲，是名年輕漂亮的舞蹈老師。

sentences.english: He becomes more and more interested in exploring the possibility of a "non-dancing" body.
sentences.chinese: 他對“非舞蹈化”肢體的可能性愈加關注。

sentences.english: She can be counted as a dancer.
This chopstick dance comes from Mongolia.
sentences.chinese: 筷子舞起源於蒙古的舞蹈。

sentences.english: Learning basic footwork in Manipuri dance is essential.
sentences.chinese: 學習舞蹈的基本步法在曼尼普爾是必不可少的。

sentences.english: She never had children because they would have interfered with her dancing career.
sentences.chinese: 她一直沒生孩子，因爲孩子會妨礙她的舞蹈生涯。

sentences.english: Has your practice amount changed throughout your dancing career?
sentences.chinese: 在你的舞蹈生涯裏，你練舞的時間表會經常變嗎？

sentences.english: I majored in classical voice and art and minored in dance and drama.
sentences.chinese: 我主修古典聲樂和藝術，輔修舞蹈和舞劇。

sentences.english: This dance is accompanied by percussion instruments, including drums and coconut shells.
sentences.chinese: 這種舞蹈要配合鼓和椰子殼類的打擊樂器來表演。

sentences.english: They danced on the point of the figure of the mid spring.
sentences.chinese: 她們在仲春的指尖上輕輕地舞蹈。

sentences.english: Tibetan Opera, a kind of dance used to express stories of Gods and ghosts, was originated from Tiaoshen.
sentences.chinese: 據說藏戲源於“跳神”這種講述神鬼故事的宗教舞蹈。

sentences.english: I have two jobs, besides managing dancers.
sentences.chinese: 我除了管理舞蹈演員還有兩個工作。
